entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 10:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17 except minus 21 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 17 except minus 21 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
